languages.text: В жуткой мертвой твари узнается медуза — чудовище из недр Паутины, любимый питомец друкари.
You recognise the horrific dead creature as a medusae — a monster from the depths of the Webway, the favourite pet of the Drukhari.
languages.original_text: В жуткой мертвой твари узнается медуза — чудовище из недр Паутины, любимый питомец друкари.

traits.locale_text: You recognize the horrific dead creature as a Medusae — a monster from the depths of the webway, the favorite pet of the Drukhari.

You recognise the horrific dead creature as a medusae — a monster from the depths of the Webway, the favourite pet of the Drukhari.

languages.text: 你辨认出这只已经死亡的恐怖生物是美杜莎。它是来自网道深处的怪物，是黑暗灵族最喜欢的宠物。
languages.original_text: You recognise the horrific dead creature as a medusae — a monster from the depths of the Webway, the favourite pet of the Drukhari.

traits.locale_text: 你辨认出这只已经死亡的恐怖生物是美杜莎。它是来自网道深处的怪物，是黑暗灵族最喜欢的宠物。

languages.text: Reconoces la abominación muerta: se trata de una Medusa, un monstruo que mora en las profundidades de la Telaraña y una de las mascotas predilectas de los Drukhari.
languages.original_text: You recognise the horrific dead creature as a medusae — a monster from the depths of the Webway, the favourite pet of the Drukhari.

traits.locale_text: Reconoces la abominación muerta: se trata de una Medusa, un monstruo que mora en las profundidades de la Telaraña y una de las mascotas predilectas de los Drukhari.

languages.text: あなたはこの悍ましい死骸がメデューサのものであることに気づく。これは網辻の深部からやってきた怪物であり、デュカーリのお気に入りのペットだ。
languages.original_text: You recognise the horrific dead creature as a medusae — a monster from the depths of the Webway, the favourite pet of the Drukhari.

traits.locale_text: あなたはこの悍ましい死骸がメデューサのものであることに気づく。これは網辻の深部からやってきた怪物であり、デュカーリのお気に入りのペットだ。

languages.text: Du identifizierst die schreckliche tote Kreatur als Medusae – ein Monster aus den Tiefen des Netzes der Tausend Tore und Lieblingshaustier der Drukhari.
languages.original_text: You recognise the horrific dead creature as a medusae — a monster from the depths of the Webway, the favourite pet of the Drukhari.

traits.locale_text: Du identifizierst die schreckliche tote Kreatur als Medusae – ein Monster aus den Tiefen des Netzes der Tausend Tore und Lieblingshaustier der Drukhari.

languages.text: L'effroyable créature morte est une méduse, un monstre issu des profondeurs de la Toile dont les Drukharis apprécient particulièrement la compagnie.
languages.original_text: You recognise the horrific dead creature as a medusae — a monster from the depths of the Webway, the favourite pet of the Drukhari.

traits.locale_text: L'effroyable créature morte est une méduse, un monstre issu des profondeurs de la Toile dont les Drukharis apprécient particulièrement la compagnie.

languages.text: Bu korkunç ancak ölü yaratığın bir medüz olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Drukharilerin evcil hayvan olarak beslemeye bayıldığı, Ağyol'un derinliklerinden gelen bir canavar bu.
languages.original_text: You recognise the horrific dead creature as a medusae — a monster from the depths of the Webway, the favourite pet of the Drukhari.
